company_context: ABM Platform for B2B Sales & Marketing Success | Demandbase Open navigation Grow high-quality pipeline faster with the only AI platform built for how B2B really buys Demandbase unifies your data, aligns every GTM team, and turns signals into revenue based on the buying groups behind every decision Watch a demo Book a meeting Winning teams use Demandbase to grow 3X increase in conversions Adobe +52% increase in revenue SAP Concur +50% growth in average deal size Thermo Fisher Scientific +83% increase in pipeline velocity Ingram Micro Your sales and marketing simplified. Amplified by AI. AI built on 20 years of B2B data. From intent detection to automated plays, Demandbase orchestrates your whole revenue engine. Identify and engage the right buying groups in your accounts, not just contacts—at exactly the right moment—with messages tailored to exactly what they need. See what’s behind our data Pipeline AI automates your next best move Demandbase blends 1st, 2nd, and 3rd-party data into a single account view, then drives actions across sales and marketing, so you turn intent into pipeline at scale. Discover Agentbase See the full buying group Identify and engage entire buying groups, not just individual contacts, Blend all your account signals into a live view of every buying group and reach out exactly when they’re ready. Target buying groups Connect every team, tool, and data source Make it yours. Flexible, open and transparent, Demandbase connects seamlessly to your tech stack. Customize it, scale it, or use our data in your tools. You’re in control. See integrations The pipeline AI platform that unifies data, insights, and actions for true GTM outcomes Data from everywhere. Data you can trust. Integrate your first and our third-party party data to know who is in-market and what they are signaling. We always ensure that you have the best quantity and trusted quality of data fueling your business decisions. 1st Party: CRM, MAP, web activity, chat, email & calendar, and more. 3rd Party: Account ID, contact & buying group ID, firmographic, technographic, action and intent signals. AI-powered insights that you can see Harness transparent and tunable go-to-market intelligence generated through advanced AI and machine learning. Know who, how, when, and where to target with confidence. Most importantly, we’ll tell you why (it’s not a black box). Act with confidence Know your next best actions across marketing, advertising, and sales. All the data and insights in the world are not worth anything if you don’t act on them. Activate with clarity across all your go-to-market channels with the right automation, controls, measurement, and reporting. Unify your tech stack with integrations & APIs Enable seamless data flow for action anywhere. We’ll meet you where you are across your sales and marketing tech stack. Allow the data and insights to flow wherever you want them to be. Advertising CRM Marketing automation Content marketing platform Web personalization

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps B2B companies like yours optimize their sales and marketing efforts. Can I speak with the CTO, please?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: This is John, the CTO. What's this about?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi John, thanks for taking my call. I understand that Demandbase is a key part of your sales and marketing strategy. Our solution, DeepData AI, can actually complement your existing Demandbase platform by providing more accurate and efficient data processing capabilities.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure we need another data solution right now. We've just implemented Demandbase and are still getting used to it. What makes DeepData AI so special?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Well, John, our AI-powered engine can help you process large amounts of data much faster and more accurately than traditional methods. This can lead to better insights and decision-making for your sales and marketing teams. Plus, our solution is designed to integrate seamlessly with existing platforms like Demandbase.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds interesting, but I'm concerned about the cost. We've already invested a significant amount in Demandbase, and I'm not sure we have the budget for another solution right now. How does your pricing work?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is competitive and based on the specific needs of your organization. We offer customized plans that can scale with your business. I'd be happy to discuss pricing in more detail and explore options that might work for you.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate that, but to be honest, this isn't a priority for us right now. We're in the middle of a major project and don't have the bandwidth to take on another implementation. Plus, I'm not sure if our team has the expertise to integrate another new solution.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns, John. Perhaps we could discuss a pilot program or a trial to test out our solution and see the value it can bring to your organization? This would allow you to see the benefits without a large upfront commitment.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, Alex, but I'm afraid we're just too busy right now to consider any new solutions. We need to focus on our current priorities and can't take on anything else at this time. Thank you for reaching out, but I think we'll have to pass on DeepData AI for now.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more aggressively addressed the buyer's timing concerns and explored potential solutions that could help the buyer prioritize the implementation of DeepData AI. Sentiment: Neutral
